pages.text: A Feeding Slab is a great way to provide pollination sources for the bees without taking up too much space. One slab allows for up two 3 different items to be inserted.

Since an an $(l:blocks/hives/advanced_hives)Advanced Hive$(/l) with a $(l:items/upgrades#simulator)Simulator Upgrade$(/l) only has 1 flower block position, feeding slabs work very well with them, letting you have up to 3 different types of bees working in the hive.
Feeding slabs can be honey-logged giving the bees an excellent place to dip their toes and recover from a long day of works, giving them regeneration.
